DOC.brief_summary: Randomized controlled trial design determine whether acupuncture effective treatment vestibulitis .
DOC.brief_title: The Use Acupuncture Treatment Vulvar Vestibulitis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize five acupuncture session design treat pain vulvar area ( study group ) , five acupuncture session design tranquility ( control ) . Participants evaluate gynecologist blind randomization . Participants examine clinically treatment one month completion assign treatment ; visit complete Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) questionnaire . FSFI score pain intercourse total score use evaluate change . The examine gynecologist evaluate degree sensitivity touch degree local erythema . Response treatment evaluate group treatment , study group compare control group .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis vestibulodynia Pregnancy Patient receive treatment vestibulodynia month preceding .
